Content.Text: Good morning, <MYNAME>. May I come in?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, how's the ranch going? I want
to talk to you about the Gardening
Tour.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
The last one ended pretty badly, so we
have to make up for it in the next. I
can't let it go.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
To be honest, the last one wasn't great.
But I hope that'll be our motivation
to do that much better next time.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The last one was wasn't bad. But I know
you can do better. I hope you'll keep
pushing yourself for the top.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I know how hard you tried for the last
one! The audience really liked it. We're
sure to have plenty of people this time.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Everyone was satisfied at the previous
tour. I'm proud of you. I think we'll
get even more customers now.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
The last tour was spectacular! Everyone
was thanking you! I hope the next one
will be  just as great!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Though this will be our first tour, a
lot of people are already interested.
How about giving it a try?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What are you going to do for this
month's Gardening Tour?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Really?! You'll do it?! Thank you,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Then we'll hold the tour on the
<BLUE>11th of this month</BLUE>. Make sure you're
ready for it. I can't wait!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, I see. That's too bad. Well, I hope
you'll do something next month.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now if you'll excuse me. Sorry to bother
you so early in the morning. Have a
nice day!
